user_stories.title: As a Project Manager, I want to define the project's core objectives so that we have a clear understanding of what the 'Simple Project' aims to achieve.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on identifying the primary goals and desired outcomes of the 'Simple Project' to guide all subsequent development efforts.
acceptance_criteria: Project objectives are documented and approved by key stakeholders.
Objectives are SMART (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound).
The project's success metrics are clearly tied to the defined objectives.

tasks.title: Facilitate a stakeholder meeting to gather input on project objectives.
tasks.description: Organize and lead a meeting with all relevant stakeholders to brainstorm and discuss potential objectives for the 'Simple Project'.

tasks.title: Draft a preliminary list of project objectives.
tasks.description: Based on stakeholder input, draft a concise list of objectives, ensuring they align with the project's overall purpose.

tasks.title: Review and refine objectives with core team.
tasks.description: Collaborate with the core project team to review the drafted objectives, refining them for clarity, measurability, and achievability.

tasks.title: Obtain formal approval for project objectives.
tasks.description: Present the finalized project objectives to key stakeholders for formal approval, ensuring buy-in and agreement.

user_stories.title: As a Systems Architect, I want to establish the technical boundaries of the project so that we avoid scope creep and maintain a focused development effort.
user_stories.description: This story is about defining what the 'Simple Project' will and will not include from a technical implementation perspective, ensuring adherence to the 'simple' nature.
acceptance_criteria: A clear document outlining in-scope and out-of-scope technical features exists.
Dependencies on external systems or components are identified and documented.
Architectural constraints (e.g., technology stack, hosting environment) are specified.

tasks.title: Analyze initial project requirements to identify potential technical components.
tasks.description: Review early requirements to start mapping out the technical landscape needed for the project.

tasks.title: Document 'in-scope' technical features and functionalities.
tasks.description: Create a definitive list of technical features that will be developed as part of the 'Simple Project', ensuring alignment with the project objectives.

tasks.title: Document 'out-of-scope' technical features and functionalities.
tasks.description: Clearly list what will NOT be included in the 'Simple Project' to prevent misinterpretation and future scope creep.

tasks.title: Collaborate with development team to validate technical scope.
tasks.description: Discuss the defined technical scope with the development team to ensure it's realistic, achievable, and aligns with their expertise.

tasks.title: Obtain stakeholder sign-off on technical boundaries.
tasks.description: Present the defined technical scope to relevant stakeholders for their approval, confirming agreement on what will be built.

user_stories.title: As a Technical Writer, I want to create initial project documentation so that new team members and stakeholders can quickly understand the project's scope.
user_stories.description: This story focuses on creating foundational documentation that captures the high-level project scope and objectives for easy reference and onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: A Project Scope Document is drafted and reviewed.
Document clearly outlines objectives, in/out-of-scope items, and key stakeholders.
Documentation is accessible to all relevant team members and stakeholders.

tasks.title: Gather all available information on project objectives and boundaries.
tasks.description: Collect notes, meeting minutes, and any existing documentation related to the 'Simple Project's' scope.

tasks.title: Draft the initial 'Project Scope Document'.
tasks.description: Create a preliminary version of the Project Scope Document, incorporating all agreed-upon objectives, features, and boundaries.

tasks.title: Review the document with Project Manager and Systems Architect.
tasks.description: Share the drafted document with the Project Manager and Systems Architect for accuracy, clarity, and completeness feedback.

tasks.title: Incorporate feedback and finalize the document.
tasks.description: Make necessary revisions based on feedback and prepare the final version of the Project Scope Document for distribution.

tasks.title: Upload finalized document to the project's shared repository.
tasks.description: Ensure the document is easily accessible to all team members and stakeholders in a designated location.
